item.title: Help with making telports
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:4, topic:250756”]c.toX = xxxx; c.toY = yyyy;

Thats what it would be, Or i think it is;

c.triggerTele("xxxx, yyyy, Heightlevel);[/code]

You change the xxxx to your X Coordinate, yyyy to your Y coordinate,
And the heightlevel to what level you want to be at, Ground level is 0.[/quote]

umm this is the codes i hav with that [code]case 51031:
if(c.q5 > 0){
c.triggerTele(2772, 2794, 0);
}
if(c.q5 == 0){
c.sM("You must have started Monkey Madness to use this teleport.");
}
break;
case 73140:
case 29031:
if(c.q5 > 0){
c.triggerTele(2772, 2794, 0);
}
if(c.q5 == 0){
c.sM("You must have started Monkey Madness to use this teleport.");
}
break;
case 73100:
case 4140:
case 50235:
c.triggerTele(3088+misc.random(3),3500+misc.random(3), 0);
break;
case 9167:
if(c.teleEffect == 1)
c.triggerTele(3087+misc.random(2), 3498+misc.random(2), 0);
if(c.teleEffect == 2)
c.triggerTele(3020+misc.random(2), 4815+misc.random(2), 0);
if(c.teleEffect == 3)
c.sendQuest("Danger Info", 8144);
c.clearQuestInterface();
c.sendQuest("KBD is at a deep wilderness level", 8147);
c.sendQuest("so PKing is entirely possible", 8148);
c.sendQuest("also remember to bring an anti d shield", 8149);
c.sendQuest("or use mage protection prayer", 8150);
c.sendQuest("as the KBD can hit quite high", 8151);
c.sendQuestSomething(8143);
c.showInterface(8134);
c.flushOutStream();
break;

case 9168:
if(c.teleEffect == 1)
c.triggerTele(3244, 3518, 0);
if(c.teleEffect == 2)
c.closeInterface();
if(c.teleEffect == 3)
c.triggerTele(2273, 4695, 0);
c.sM("WARNING! You have been teleported to the KBD, Watch out for pkers!");
c.sM("Use the lever south of here to exit");
break;
case 9169:
if(c.teleEffect == 1)
c.triggerTele(2539+misc.random(2), 4716+misc.random(2), 0);
if(c.teleEffect == 3)
c.closeInterface();
break;

case 17111:
		c.closeInterface();
					if (c.playerAncientMagics == 0) {
						 c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
					}
					if (c.playerAncientMagics == 1) {
						c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
					}
break;
case 59136:
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(2670, 3710, 0);
if(c.interfaceGame == 2)
c.triggerTele(3564, 3288, 0);
break;
case 59137:
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(2455, 10147, 0);
if(c.interfaceGame == 2)
c.triggerTele(2399, 5178, 0);
break;
case 59135:
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(2834, 3264, 0);
if(c.interfaceGame == 2)
c.triggerTele(2659, 2676, 0);
break;
case 59139:
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(3550, 9947, 0);
if(c.interfaceGame == 2)
c.triggerTele(2603, 3153, 0);
break;
case 59138:
if(c.interfaceGame == 1)
c.triggerTele(3428, 3537, 0);
break;[/code]

[quote="Jeremy368, post:5, topic:250756"]Link to vid  [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2hdts8o&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2hdts8o&s=4[/url] I repost it because i think he screwed up when posting it and i had to mess wit the url to get it working.
Edit: i could prolly help you but it would take alot of 1 on 1 time and i am pretty sure some one else has the code right sitting in the back of their head just waiting to post it here[/quote]

 and add my msn stlz_bosnain@hotmail.com if u can help me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 07:43:40 pm[/size][hr][quote="si force, post:4, topic:250756"][code]c.toX = xxxx;
c.toY = yyyy;

Thats what it would be, Or i think it is;

c.triggerTele("xxxx, yyyy, Heightlevel);

You change the xxxx to your X Coordinate, yyyy to your Y coordinate,
And the heightlevel to what level you want to be at, Ground level is 0.[/quote]

hey the only one of those i need to chnage for now is the island 1 how i make them teleport with my new interface they were in the fight pit view thing [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2008, 02:48:24 pm[/size][hr]guys plz help i no thats just to change cords but i chnaged the interface thats y th teleports arnt working how u make them work???

item.title: Help with making telports
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

c.toX = xxxx; c.toY = yyyy;

Thats what it would be, Or i think it is;

c.triggerTele("xxxx, yyyy, Heightlevel);

You change the xxxx to your X Coordinate, yyyy to your Y coordinate,
And the heightlevel to what level you want to be at, Ground level is 0.
